title: Miniature teddy bear with floral embroidery for dollhouse in 1:12 scale
description: This delicate teddy bear is lovingly crocheted by hand in 1:12 scale, making it a perfect addition to any dollhouse nursery or cozy scene. Soft in texture and rich in detail, the bear features tiny embroidered floral accents on its belly — adding charm, warmth, and a touch of whimsy. Its gentle expression and careful stitching make it feel like a treasured heirloom in miniature form. Whether placed on a shelf, tucked into a crib, or gifted as part of a diorama, this bear bri…
